response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds significant value for us at $15,000. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth to you, we propose a fair price of $12,000. This offer allows you to acquire the product at a price slightly above its intrinsic value to you, ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
